post:
Cloudean Infotech is a technology company that administer solution and environment that puts our customers in the finest position to succeed.
We are providing premium managed services since 2016; powered by enterprise grade cloud infrastructure providers which can assure performance, low-latency and stability for our clients.
Our highly experienced IT professionals specialize in working as your partner to fully understand your unique business needs. We’ll craft a secure end-to-end solution that meets your current business needs and supports your future goals to drive results.

Managed WordPress
For high-traffic websites and WooCommerce shops!

DDoS Protected AnyCat DNS
CloudLinux with CageFS
Imunify360 Security Suite
MailChannels [Hourly 100 Emails]

Daily offsite Backup
Technical & migration assistance

Control panel : Plesk

PHP [7.3 - 8.0]
WordPress Tolkit

Let us handle all the technical aspects of your WordPress application.
That means updates to both core and plugins, proactive security and advanced tuning for optimal speed and performance.
